purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of information needed to describe network of functional units, by specifying connections between functional units in the network as nodes and mapping nodes of functional network to it's usage view.

inscope.li: identification of a network of functional units;
identification of connections between functional units in the network;
identification of the equivalent functional unit definitions;
items within the scope of Model_parameter_arm;
items within the scope of Network_functional_usage_view_arm;
items within the scope of Requirement_assignment_arm.

definition.def: a type of product design representation described as an assembly of functions or implied function
the degree to which an object is designed or adapted to a particular function or use
a collection of related items and where the relationship between the items may be represented by a directed acyclic graph in which a node has only one parent node
a collection of related items and where the relationship between the items may be represented by a directed acyclic graph in which a node may have one or more parent nodes
a domain in which each model explicitly states only one type of relationship between model elements
